sentences.sContent: She shook her mane of auburn hair .
sentences.sContent_eng: She shook her mane of auburn hair .

sentences.sContent: All the people living in that country have auburn hair.
sentences.sContent_eng: All the people living in that country have auburn hair.
sentences.sCn: 住在那个村子里的人们的头发全是赤褐色的。

remMethod.val: au + burn (燃烧) → 像燃烧的火焰 → 赤褐色

trans.tranOther: auburn hair is a reddish brown colour
